pkgmetadata.longdescription: # flake8-empty-init-modulesflake8 plugin that disallows code in `__init__.py` modules.## installation```shpython -m pip install flake8-empty-init-modules```## checks### EIM001Disallows all code in any `__init__.py` module.### EIM002Allows imports and assignment to `__all__` in `__init__.py` modules, but nothingelse.This check is disabled by default. To use this check instead of `EIM001` add thefollowing to your `setup.cfg````ini[flake8]ignore = EIM001enable-extensions=EIM002```## rationaleCode in `__init__.py` modules is often unwanted because:- it runs at import-time - this can cause surprising import-time side-effects- these modules are often empty, so code there is easily missedThe relaxed version of this check allows convenience imports in `__init__.py`modules without allowing 'real' code to hide out there.
